typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orderdetail
Orders, Orderdetail join(Orders@OrderID == Orderdetail@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SalesOrders
SalesOrders select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = Orders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = Orders@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = Orders@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesOrderConformed
SalesOrderConformed derive(SourceId = 1,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('1',OrderDetailID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> SalesStaging
SalesStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		SourceId,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID
	)) ~> SalesOrderDetail
